title: Walk to schools, library, pool, Best Schools, private fenced yard
neighborhood: Mercer Island, Bellevue, Seattle, Kirkland, Redmond, Renton
posting_body: Mercer Island has the Best Schools.
Ave SE, next to High School.

Nice Mercer Island rambler house for Rent: spacious 3 bed 2 bath, walk 3 blocks to library, swimming pool, multiple daycares and Boys & Girls club, Northwood Elementary school, 5 houses away from MI high school, in safe and quiet residential area, perfect for a small family with *fully-fenced* backyard, Best public schools in WA!

Remodeled in 2016, well maintained, hardwood floors thru-out, fireplace, spacious living room and kitchen with lots of natural lights, front yard; backyard is fully fenced with patio, 2-car garage + driveway space for 6 cars.
Extra big storage shed in backyard.
0.5 mile to I-90 entrance, 1 mile to MI city center shopping area.
It's only about 5 min drive to Seattle or eastside Bellevue, 15min drive to Redmond, Kirkland, Renton, Issaquah, wonderful central location!
No Pets, No Smoking, No Vaping.
Will sign 1-year lease to start with, looking for long-term tenants (1+ years).
Security deposit $3600, $300 cleaning fee, $40 per adult application fee.
Will run Employment, credit report and background check, credit 700+
***Please TEXT or EMAIL with your name, cell#, showing by appointment *** thank you.
